text:
If you use the WebDAV-Client you have to connect the client to your server.
But there some bugs in the connect method:

1. It isn't possible to connect to "http://localhost:8080/slide" because the 
final slash is missing. The slash will appended automatically 
to "http://localhost:8080/slide/" 

2. Sadly it is also possible to connect the client to a single file of the 
server. In this case, all following WebDAV methods doesn't work correct.
creator: tbernert@c1-fse.de
